name: The remaining outstanding principal of one entry equals the initial outstanding

children.description: Given details of "5000.00","5.0",'4' and "2018-01-01" to create generate Plan request payload
When user invoke rest service to generate Plan
Then validate remaining outstanding principal of one entry equals the initial outstanding principal of the following month
